article_title: Homeless get needed help at Project Housing Connect
article_text:
Midland, MI (48640)

Today

Partly cloudy.

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author: Joe Mortensen for the Daily News

og.description: Midland County residents who are homeless or need help to keep their housing are urged to make their way to First United Methodist Church in Midland on Nov. 4 between
